}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RYK-WNFQ255ACNBT RYK-WNFQ255ACNBT] (2016-04-27) :802.11a/b/g/n/ac + BT 4.1 M.2 Type Card *[[QCA]] Model: [[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA34AC|QCNFA34AC]] (NGFF M.2 1630 Key A/E) :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCNFA34AC PPD-QCNFA34AC] (06/06/2014) *'''Lenovo Yoga 3-1470''' Laptop (Manual) :802.11a/b/g/n/ac + BT4.2 M.2 Type Card : :[[Qualcomm Atheros]], Inc. Model: QCNFA34AC :[[Lite-On]] Model: WCBN804A-L6, WCBN805A-L6 :OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN804A]], [[Lite-On WCBN805A]]
===Specifications=== :‧ Chipset: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174 (MAC/BB/RF) :‧ Standard: 802.11abgn/ac 2T2R (867Mbps) MU-MIMO :‧ Interface: M.2 Card (PCIe: WLAN; USB 2.0: Bluetooth) :‧ Bluetooth: V 4.1, V 4.0 LE, V 3.0 + HS, V 2.1 + EDR :‧ Antenna: 2x IPEX MHF4 connector, 2T2R 867Mbps (MCS9) :‧ Enhanced wireless security: WEP, WPA, WPA2, 802.1x :‧ Concurrent Wi-Fi and BT co-existence, support Windows
==See also== * [[SparkLAN WNFQ-158ACN(BT)]] - 802.11ac WiFi + BT M.2 Module :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R; OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN806A]] :[[Lite-On]] WCBN604BH-L6, WCBN806A-S6 ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2973099 FCC Label Sample]) * [[SparkLAN WNFQ-255ACN(BT)]] - 802.11ac WiFi + BT M.2 Module :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174, 2T2R; OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN804A]] * [[SparkLAN WNFQ-258ACN(BT)]] - 802.11ac WiFi + BT M.2 Module :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A-5, 2T2R; OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN807A]]
